recommendedProducts.whyOliLovesIt: We love Celimax The Real Noni Energy Repair Cream for its rejuvenating benefits and deeply hydrating formula. At Olis Lab, we value products that work to restore the skin’s natural energy and improve its overall health. This cream delivers both immediate hydration and long-term radiance, making it a perfect fit for anyone looking to restore vitality to their skin.
recommendedProducts.description: Celimax The Real Noni Energy Repair Cream is a nourishing cream that restores vitality to tired, dull skin. Enriched with noni extract, this cream helps to brighten and repair the skin, providing deep hydration while improving elasticity and texture for a smooth, radiant complexion.
recommendedProducts.howToUse: Use as the final step in your skincare routine. Apply an even layer to your face and neck, gently massaging to lock in moisture and revitalise the skin.

At Olis Lab, we value products that provide visible results without irritation, and this cream is a great solution for those seeking a balanced and hydrated complexion.
recommendedProducts.description: Torriden Balanceful Cica Cream is a soothing cream formulated with centella asiatica (Cica) to calm and restore the skin. This cream deeply hydrates, improves skin elasticity, and helps to reduce redness and irritation, leaving the skin feeling soft, smooth, and rejuvenated.
recommendedProducts.howToUse: As the final step of your routine, apply an even layer to your face and neck. Massage gently to lock in moisture and calm sensitive skin.

 Chinensis Seed Oil*, Glycerin*, Gossypium Herbaceum Seed Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter*, Niacinamide, Opuntia ficus indica Seed Oil*, Aqua, Cellulose Gum, Sodium Hyaluronate, Citrus Bergamia Peel Oil Expressed, Sucrose Laurate, Sucrose Stearate, Parfum**, Microcrystalline Cellulose, Xanthan

recommendedProducts.concerns: Dryness, Hyperpigmentation, Enlarged Pores, Dullness, Acne, spots, Texture, Anti-aging prevention
recommendedProducts.whyOliLovesIt: At Olis Lab, we carefully select products that deliver exceptional results. Rowse's All-Day Hydration Serum with Niacinamide stands out for its quality ingredients and proven effectiveness. We love how it addresses key skincare concerns while maintaining the highest standards of formulation and performance.
recommendedProducts.description: Designed to quench thirsty skin, this lightweight serum delivers all-day hydration while strengthening the skin barrier. Niacinamide works to brighten and refine texture, while humectants draw in moisture for long-lasting hydration. The result? Skin that looks plump, balanced, and radiant from morning to night.
recommendedProducts.howToUse: Apply a few drops to clean skin before moisturiser. Use morning and night for optimal hydration and skin barrier support.

recommendedProducts.name: Low pH Good Morning Gel Cleanser
recommendedProducts.ingredients: Water, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Lauroyl Methyl Isethionate, Sodium Chloride, Polysorbate 20, Styrax Japonicus Branch/Fruit/Leaf Extract, Butylene Glycol, Saccharomyces Ferment, Cryptomeria Japonica Leaf Extract, Nelumbo Nucifera Leaf Extract, Pinus Palustris Leaf Extract, Ulmus Davidiana Root Extract, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Flower Extract, Pueraria Lobata Root Extract, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Allantoin, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Betaine Salicylate, Citric Acid, Ethyl Hexanediol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Sodium Benzoate, Disodium EDTA
recommendedProducts.whyOliLovesIt: We love COSRX Low pH Good Morning Gel Cleanser for its gentle, hydrating formula that cleanses without causing dryness. At Olis Lab, we value cleansers that maintain the skin’s natural balance, and this gel cleanser does just that. It’s perfect for daily use and helps maintain a smooth, hydrated complexion.
recommendedProducts.description: COSRX Low pH Good Morning Gel Cleanser is a gentle yet effective cleanser that balances the skin’s pH while thoroughly cleansing. With a low pH formula, it cleanses the skin without stripping it of its natural moisture, leaving it feeling soft, hydrated, and refreshed. Ideal for morning use, it preps the skin for the day ahead.
recommendedProducts.howToUse: Use in the morning or evening. Apply a small amount to wet skin, lather, and gently massage in circular motions. Rinse with lukewarm water for a clean, refreshed feel
